mapper.update: update cart set product_count=#{product_count} where cart_no=${cart_no}
mapper.select: SELECT cart_no,mem_no,product_name,product_count, selling_price, img_name_save FROM cart c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_img pi ON c.product_id = pi.product_id where mem_no=#{mem_no} and img_category='main'
select * from cart where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
